#include <vector>
#include <stack>
#include <set>
#include <map>
#include <queue>
#include <deque>
#include <string>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <string>
using namespace std;

vector<int> d;
int ans, n;

int main() {
    scanf("%d", &n);
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        int x;
        cin >> x;
        vector<int>::iterator it = upper_bound(d.begin(), d.end(), x);
        if (it == d.end()) d.push_back(x);
        else *it = x;
    }
    printf("%d", d.size());
    return 0;
}
